author: simoneg
msg: LABS-235 : Database now uses bean converter if the entity is not persisted

author: mgoulish
msg: Add retry capability to several cpg calls.
First retry is immediate, next one after 10 usec,
Retry pause maxes out at 0.1 second.
Then give up and report error.
The lack of retry on one of these calls must have
failures seen over the last month or so.

author: jacopoc
msg: Re-enabled (and slightly improved) automatic work effort creation for shipment related events.
